sub_title: Head Engineer at HAL5 Studio | AudioHeld | PodcastLab
summary:
Sound & Music and sound is the core of everything I do. As an audio engineer I specialise in recording engineering, mixing and editting. I am also a proficient mastering engineer, audio post producer and video editor. This skillset means I can make almost any AV project a reality from start to finish.

After gaining my bachelor of recording arts the school of audio engineering (SAE) in Amsterdam hired me as one of there audio staff members. After training audio students for 9 years and fulfilling various roles within the institute I now manage one of the top 10 recording studios in Amsterdam as well as operate 2 audio business; 20Twelve Audio and Audio Held.

20Twelve is my first company I started back in, you guessed it 2012. Though its composition and mission have altered over time its main role is to provide freelance audio production services of the highest standard. Audio Held is my podcast editing company and with it I have edited and mixed more than 1500 episodes in a timespan of around 3 years.

treasury_media.title: Music Studio Amsterdam | Amsterdam | HAL5 Studio
treasury_media.description: A professional music production studio in Amsterdam that feels like a second home to musicians. Equipped with amazing gear and staffed by a wide variety of professionals to suit any project and sound.

awards.title: Nomination Best Blues Dutch Blue Album 2015
awards.description: After winning the award 3 consecutive years in a row. We were once again nominated! This time though we had to settle for being in the top 3. However this Album specifically was my favourite out of the 4 released titles.

awards.title: Nomination best horror & Nomination best behind the scenes
awards.description: After we entered the my rode reel competition in 2015 ( allegedly the biggest international short film competition to date) with "the legacy of magus" we unfortunately did not win a prize but we did manage to get nominated in two categories which made us very knowing there were more then 1200 films competing. Check out the project category for more info.

awards.title: Best Dutch Blues Album 2014
awards.description:
I can't describe how happy we are to have won the best Dutch blues album 3rd time in a row. The Damned and Dirty duo aka Kevin de Harde and Micha Sprenger have done their best composing and recording the album just as we have done our best engineering the whole project from start to finish.

The result was this beautiful award. On to the next one!

awards.title: Evol Intent Middle Of The Night Remix Contest (3rd Place)
awards.description:
ZeroZero & Teknian worked long and hard on a really great Drum and Bass remix for Evol Intent. I did the mastering to get it up to standard with the competition, from the hundreds of submissions we made it to third place. I usually do not mention remix competitions but due to my personal respect and appreciation for the Evol Intent crew I really wanted to mention this here.

It was released as such on their Label.

awards.title: SAE Alumni Award 2014 (Support)
awards.description: I was the lead audio for the game award winning student game project known as "Float". Me and many of the audio students who participated helped the game students finish their amazing project.

awards.title: Best Dutch Blues Album 2013
awards.description: Together with Erwin Palper we engineered the award winning "Sell Your Soul" Album by the Damned and Dirty. This is the second time in a row this award went to a 20Twelve Engineered Blues album.

awards.title: Best Dutch Blues Album 2012
awards.description: The Debut Album from the Damned and Dirty won the award of best blue album of 2012. This was a beautiful victory for the 20Twelve crew as we engineered the album in the same year as we founded the company.

projects.title: Production: Jahir
projects.description: My own personal passion project. Jahir is me and my good friend Chaimaa Rochdi who make some intense electronic music with Arabic lyrics and musical instruments.

projects.description: I had the pleasure of working on the string quartet ( north sea string quartet) for Tim Akkermans Christmas single. I am also fully responsible for the mixing engineering behind the acoustic version of this delightful song.

projects.description: Mastering for a lovely "oldschool sound meets new school engineering" project. Ray Gun hero (Boston, USA) produced this nice EP and was very happy with the results of the mastering process.

projects.description: Composer & Sound designer Simon Viklund is in the process of getting his amazing soundtracks for the triple A cross platform game "PayDay 2" rereleased through official channels. 20Twelve is doing the remastering of all the pieces.  Volume 1 is released.

projects.description: Ken Parsons and his crew known as Monty Pagan decided to come forth with an Album that took quite long to finish due to the large variety of instruments that had to be recorded for the acoustic folky Album that was named Dealing with Demons.

projects.title: Album: Damned & Dirty - Rolling Into Town
projects.description: Every year a new Album. Every year new guest musicians. Every year a different recording studio. Damned & Dirty won 2012 and 2013 best Blues album and in 2014 we yet again produced a fresh bluesy Album with the duo and their small army of musicians. We are curious about its success after its release in November.

Senior developer at Icontact. Vocalist, bluesharp player and songwriter in multiple bands.

projects.title: Post Pro: Dolfinarium Caribbean Summer Nights
projects.description: The aquatic zoo known as the Dolfinarium contacted CrozzRoads to design animate and produce their commercial for the summer events in 2014. CrozzRoads in turn contacted 20Twelve to do the lead audio. This way we became the lead audio for the project and were responsible for music/ voiceover/ soundesign/ mixing/ mastering and all the editting. The commercial aired on national Television through RTL4 and Telekids.

projects.title: Album: Dirt Agogo - Debut Album
projects.description: We did a demo EP for them back in 2012, but in 2014 after winning several prices they decided to come back to do an Album in the BandBunker. Dirt Agogo is a raw rockabilly punk band with high tempos, sweet riffs, insane vocals and an upright bass.

projects.description: After their first try out album the year before (also recorded by us though before 20Twelve) they came back for a better prepared and more pre produced album called Dance Music. Turned out to be one a real nice power rock album.

projects.title: Album: Miracle of Sound - Level 11
projects.description: After the succes from the Level 10 Masters. I was asked to be the mixing and mastering engineer for all releases in 2020 which again led to a full length album by the end of the year. This specific records and all the songs therein has probably been the most challenging mixing task in my career with massive arrangement in a wide variety of styles and hundreds of different instruments.

contributors.headline: Head Engineer at HAL5 Studio | AudioHeld | PodcastLab

projects.title: Album: Botanic - At Vancouver
projects.description: Botanic is a young band consisting of a mixed bag of people from all over Europe. They came to the studio in order to create a debut Album. We did the recording, mixing and mastering for them and it turned out to be an amazing Trip Hop album.

contributors.headline: Head Engineer at HAL5 Studio | AudioHeld | PodcastLab

projects.title: Mastering: Miracle of Sound - Level 10
projects.description: Miracle of Sound a successful independent artist approached me to help him remaster all the singles he put out for 2019. He does this every year where he collects all the singles onto one album and remasters them appropriately.

contributors.headline: Head Engineer at HAL5 Studio | AudioHeld | PodcastLab

projects.title: Coordinating: Development nights (Dev Nights)
projects.description: Every 6 months the interactive animation students at SAE have a final project, usually a video game, they need to deliver in order to finish their diploma level. In order to really make some progress they hold 48 hour development nights ( or weekends) when they are nearing the deadline. Me and my audio students join them during these nights to produce the sound track, voicing and all sound effects (mostly based on foley recording) within the given time limit. Students will have to be extremely creative and efficient in order to make the target.

Head Lecturer Games

projects.title: Coorditnating: Red Bull Studio Amsterdam
projects.description: Red Bull studios is an initiative from Red Bull to help existing and upcoming artists to get their ideas to become reality. Based in the music making centre of Amsterdam Muzyq, a massive control and live room has emerged with infinite musical possibilities. I myself manage the installation of all the equipment as well as the operation of them and the supply of other audio technicians.

projects.description: A hybrid between jazz and synths, acoustic and electronic, vintage and modern. This particular project is one of the flagship projects that I have engineered. Pre production, recording, and mixing are all part of my role in this drums & keys duo its first album. One of hopefully many.

projects.title: Post Pro: My Rode Reel short film comptetition - Legacy of Magus
projects.description: Together with two young film makers we entered the my rode reel competition. The idea was that in only a few month we were to create a short film lasting 3 minutes. We took it upon ourselves to go for something very extreme including green screens, 100% ADR sound, all original soundtrack and sound design, plastered human faces blowing up and original make up and art direction. It was a bit too much for such a short time spawn but we managed to get 2 nomination at the end of the competition.

contributors.headline: Head Engineer at HAL5 Studio | AudioHeld | PodcastLab
Mede-eigenaar bij Foxity
Mede-eigenaar bij Foxity Films
Music Producer | Audio Engineer | Record Label Manager | Entreperneur

projects.title: Coordinating: Band Bunker
projects.description: In 2012 the "Per Expressie" Foundation in Amersfoort contacted 20Twelve to help them finish their professional recording studio. The studio, located in an old railway electro transformer building, was finally finished in 2013 and opened its doors to the local talent as well as other artists in the Netherlands. The 20Twelve engineers are now the head engineers at the BandBunker studio and can be found in the studio maintaining the equipment, upgrading and tinkering with the setup as well as recording bands on a regular basis. It has become a home base to the 20Twelve engineers and many of their clients.

contributors.headline: Head Engineer at HAL5 Studio | AudioHeld | PodcastLab
Creatief muzikaal ondernemer

projects.title: Post Pro - Weapon system sound library
projects.description: Together with the entire 20Twelve crew and much needed help from external audio engineers I have set out to start a profesional sound sample library to be used in future post production jobs as well as game audio projects. Our intern Chris has a good relation with the Dutch army and thus far we have been able to record and capture many valuable sounds such as .50 Cal machineguns, anti tank mines, Howitzer Artillery and man other weapon systems. Our aim is to have a proper recording for all systems available within the Dutch borders.

contributors.headline: Head Engineer at HAL5 Studio | AudioHeld | PodcastLab
Salesforce Consultant at Nextview Consulting
Soundengineer

projects.title: Album: Devine Sins - Akuma
projects.description: Most likely the longest lasting Album Project we had to engineer so far. However this has nothing to do with delays or procrastination. No, simply because extreme metal needs extreme pre production and extreme amounts of recording time as well as editing mixing and other processing time. Very challenging, very exciting and very metal!

test_scores.name: Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL)

profile_positions.description: Together with the gentleman over at foxity we started a new venture in 2022. With my years of podcast production and over 3000 episodes under my belt and their videography experience and materials we started the Podcast Lab. A physical studio to film, record and produce podcasts at the highest quality and with the focus on unburdening the podcasters as much as possible.
profile_positions.title: Partner

profile_positions.description:
A brand new audio production studio which was 3 years in the making and operates on a very knowledgable freelance collective of different engineers and technicians.

Specialising in both modern and vintage style of production by using its wide variety of equipment ranging from classic microphones from the 50s to the most modern and precise compressors available to date.

As the head engineer and manager I am responsible for the day to day operations and most recording sessions within the studio.
profile_positions.title: Studio Head Engineer

profile_positions.description: Podcast AV editing, mixing en technical support.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description: Podcast editing for the Bestek podcast ( public procurement podcast )
profile_positions.title: Audio Editor

profile_positions.description: Audio editor and mixer for the IMU Podcast and Online Marketing videos.
profile_positions.title: Audio Editor

profile_positions.description: My free lance audio company through which I have had the pleasure of working in many different facets of my profession. Clients include local and international music artists as well as a variety of businesses ranging from small local companies to bigger ones such as Pepsi, Red Bull, Dolfinarium.  I am able to provide many different audio solutions. Outside my work as a music production engineer I am readily available for audio technical support on a 1 on 1 basis as well as lecturing for larger groups of individuals. The company also has location recording sets and editing stations at its disposal. All in all if sound is involved then so can 20Twelve.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description: Pure jingles is a highly specialised production company focused on the composition, recording and mixing of radio jingle for major Radio stations across Europe and the US. Clients included Dutch 3fm, English BBC and Capitol Radio and French NRJ and RTL 2 as well as many others. I performed mixing sessions as one of the 4 mixing engineers during their high season in 2018 and mixed down several dozen jingles and drones which were held to an extremely high standard.
profile_positions.title: Audio Mixer

profile_positions.description: As the TRC of SAE Amsterdam I am responsible for keeping the Institute its facilities in tip top shape. This includes all the audio/film studios and workstations its hardware and software status. I also manage the licensing across all departments. The TRC also develops student assignments for the material he maintains and helps head of departments with their equipment needs. Other than that I am  a central figure that connects different departments together on technical and administrative level whilst coordinating the supervisors and assistants.
profile_positions.title: Technical Resource Coordinator

profile_positions.description: After starting my supervisor activities in the company I got appointed to teach several of the audio programs including both the full-time and part-time courses. Though I teach a wide variety of courses such as microphone theory, studio signal flow, EQ and dynamics, mastering and Midi theory, I specialize in recording techniques, pro tools, Logic audio and sound design. Recently I have also taught the bachelor students doing their second year of their degree.
profile_positions.title: Audio Engineering Lecturer

profile_positions.description: After teaching for some time at the institute, management gave one of the short courses named "home studio certificate" to me so that I could coordinate the program, its contents and it lecturers. The short course which lasts 6 months focusses itself on setting up a home studio or vastly improving the one you already have.
profile_positions.title: Audio Engineering Certificate Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Head of the supervisor team in SAE (school for audio engineering). Guiding students and maintaining equipment as well as developing lessons plans are only some of the tasks the supervisors perform. The head supervisors get added bonus tasks such as coordination of facilities, scheduling the working hours and taking care of grading system.
profile_positions.title: Head Supervisor

profile_positions.description: A synergy between Red Bull and SAE has caused me to be in the position of chief or head engineer at the Red Bull Studios in Amsterdam or RBSA for short. Apart from the design of the rooms I have completed the entire setup of the studio together with the help of the SAE team. Now I maintain the high quality standard in the studio and coordinate the elite SAE students who engineer in the RBSA as regular interns. RBSA has seen some of the biggest names in the music world which is good for Red Bull as a brand and even more so for the experience of my engineers.
profile_positions.title: Chief Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description: The Yamaha music school in Purmerend has an anual concert where student can show what they have learned in front of a large audience. It was a pleasure to do the FOH mixing as well as the monitors. I was also able to do live recordings so the students and their parents had a nice memory of their performance.
